articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: Snap’s extremely large Spectacles bring impressive AR to developers at $99 a month - TechCrunch
articles.description: The Spectacles 5 are designed specifically for developers.
articles.content: Snaps new Spectacles are the next big thing in the most literal way possible. The augmented reality glasses are extremely physically large. The social media firm sees the footprint as a kind of middl… [+2416 chars]
